name: The Terminal Angel Disease
description:
The "Terminal Angel Disease" is a classic top-down role playing game that could have been published in the early 90s. It was developed by one-man-hobby-indie company Captainsoft over the course of twenty years. The source code is available as well! Requires Java.

Features

  • classical 4 member party line up, with individual skills 
  • explore cities, dungeons, wilderness, caves, and special-themed maps
  • fight baddies in a mix of tactical and real time combat system
  • 250 items to loot and equiq
  • an original and funny story about life as computer game heroes
  • more than 20 hours of gameplay
